name: TheAnswerHouston
0:
”Alexa, play The Answer Houston”

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the answer houston
des: AM 1070 The ANSWER is a Newstalk radio station based in Houston, TX, that offers conservative news programming, political discussions and debates. You can listen live, find our station schedule and hear all of the latest breaking news.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
